overview: The rains haven’t fallen for 5 years and as a result, water is now the most sought-after commodity. Just like everyone else out of the fortified cities Momo’s been finding it hard to acquire water. Her journey to a trade post takes an unexpected turn when she encounters a young orphaned girl. She appears to be a survivor of a recent accident. Conflicted, Momo must decide whether to take her along on her quest or to keep to her loner ways.
title: Kiu
